EmailTemplate.description: Reference Request - Contact Limit Number has been reached
EmailTemplate.name: Reference Request - Contact Limit Reached
EmailTemplate.subject: Contact limit number has been reached for {!CustomerStory__c.Account__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!CustomerStory__c.OwnerFirstName},
Please be advised that the contact limit number of reference request for {!CustomerStory__c.Name} {!CustomerStory__c.Account__c} has been reached.
Please review the Reference Customer link {!CustomerStory__c.Link}.
Regards Salesforce Administrator
